attributes.review: this awful app gave me a migraine, bad breath and diarrhea all at once. my crush told me he loved trump and i was like maybe i’ll give this app a try. my phone crashed, died, and then committed suicide. i had to buy a new iphone but I couldn’t connect it to icloud because I didn’t want this app to be re-downloaded on my new phone
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: this app took almost a whole day to download!!! a whole day!! and it gave my brand new iphone a virus😡😡 not only do i need to get a new phone but i have to set up a whole new apple ID because almost immediately after opening the app, i got a notification saying there was suspicious activity on it in washington!! i live in cali! DO NOT GET THIS APP.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support Trump2020 but it started sending me Hillary Clinton’s rituals and made me drown my fish painfully. I was sent death threats, they wrote how they will harm me and family if I don’t obey them. I was forced to turn into tinker bell and have sexual relationships with mickey mouse. I was raped by my dog too, they said they’re disappointed and are now sending trumps oranges to kill me! VERY DISSAPOINTED. 😡😖😭
attributes.title: Unacceptable & Unhelpful

attributes.review: The app took years to download... literally years. When it finally installed it kept showing weird links to some adult websites. I for one do tolerate the vulgar things this app shows to its users. I wouldn’t recommend. You should download subway surfer instead it’s way more entertaining than this garbage.
attributes.userName: throw the orange in the ocean
attributes.title: Worst experience of 2020

attributes.review: so I’m pretty sure this app is possessed, PERIODT. first of all it took 17 days to download, and when I opened it every light, machinery, and technology turned on and wouldn’t stop or turn off for another month. This app cost us 1200 in our electricity bill. Next time I opened it, rats jumped out of my screen and infested my house. Never opening again!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support MY president Trump. But the only man that pops up on my screen is a cheeto that is referred to as bunker boy. It’s terrifying, unsettling, and nauseating seeing his face. I’m repulsed that someone like that has their own app. It’s glitchy, slow, and very hard to navigate too. I’m deeply disappointed in the app and having a cheeto in office.
attributes.title: Horrible! Doesn’t work

attributes.review: This app is as slow as Trump’s response to the Coronavirus. attributes.title: App is slow like Trump
